TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ChangeMonitor extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable
Public MustInherit Class ChangeMonitor Implements IDisposable
public ref class ChangeMonitor abstract : IDisposable

summary.span: 为用于监视缓存项所依赖数据的状态更改的派生自定义类型提供基类。

span.span: Provides a base class for a derived custom type that monitors changes in the state of the data which a cache item depends on.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类用作专用于特定的缓存实现的派生的监视器类的基类。The class is used as the base class for derived monitor classes that are specialized for particular cache implementations. A实例监视数据，具体取决于缓存项的状态中的更改。A instance monitors changes in the state of data which a cache item depends on. 例如，可以将项其内容进行缓存的文件或数据实体。For example, the item can be a file or data entity whose contents are cached. 如果更新文件或数据实体，则必须还更改关联的缓存项。If the file or data entity is updated, the associated cache entry must be changed also. 可以监视的通用项包括数据实体 （如数据库字段、 值、 行或表）、 另一个缓存项时，和文件和文件属性。Common items that can be monitored include data entities (such as database fields, values, rows, or tables), another cache entry, and files and file attributes. 依赖项更改是中的依赖项的状态的更改。A dependency change is a change in the state of a dependency. 在典型的缓存实现中之后,实例通知缓存依赖项已更改，缓存执行所需的操作，如正在使插入的缓存条目无效。In a typical cache implementation, after a instance notifies the cache that a dependency has changed, the cache performs the required action, such as invalidating the inserted cache entry. 派生可以自定义类，以监视特定的不同数据存储区的依赖项更改。Derived classes can be customized to monitor dependency changes for specific different data stores. 例如，有的文件系统、 物理内存或数据库的缓存实现。For example, there are cache implementations for a file system, physical memory, or a database. 类检查缓存中，外部发生的更改，然后警报缓存中已发生更改。The class examines changes that occur outside the cache, and then alerts the cache that changes have occurred. [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]包括派生自的以下类类：The [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] includes the following classes that derive from class: - - - - 其中每个类可用于不同类型的依赖关系。Each of these classes works with different types of dependencies. 例如，派生类监视对文件系统数据 （文件和文件夹） 的缓存的缓存项所依赖的更改。For example, the derived class monitors changes to a cache for file system data (files and folders) that the cache item depends on.

span.span: This type is thread safe.

block.para:
如果创建自定义的缓存实现或派生的更改监视器类型，必须遵循特定的准则。
If you create a custom cache implementation or a derived change monitor type, you must follow certain guidelines.
以下列表总结了这些准则。
The following list summarizes these guidelines.
有关详细信息，请参阅各个方法或属性的文档。
For more information, see the documentation for individual methods or properties.
- 派生类的构造函数必须设置属性，开始监视，并调用在方法返回之前的方法。The constructor of a derived class must set the property, begin monitoring, and call method before the method returns.如果一个构造函数在构造过程中遇到错误，并且必须以释放资源，构造函数只能调用重载后调用方法，因为重载将引发如果初始化未完成的异常。If a constructor encounters an error during constructions and must have to dispose of resources, the constructor can only call the overload after the method is called because the overload will throw an exception if initialization is not completed.
- 如果在未发生更改之前初始化是正在监视的数据完成，则构造函数必须调用方法之前调用方法。If changes occur in the data that is being monitored before initialization is complete, the constructor must call the method before calling the method.
- 后派生实例化类型时，你必须插入自定义监视器实现。After a derived type is instantiated, you must insert the monitor into a custom implementation.如果要使用更改监视器完毕后，调用或方法。Or if you are finished using the change monitor, call the method.
- 后实例插入到实现，实例需要更改监视器已释放。After a instance is inserted into a implementation, the instance require that the change monitor is disposed.即使插入无效并导致异常，实现必须调用重载。Even if the insertion is invalid and causes an exception, the implementation must call the overload.
- 派生的更改监视器插入到缓存后,实现必须调用，通过传递对象。After a derived change monitor is inserted into a cache, the implementation must call , by passing a object.可以调用仅一次的方法。The method can be called only one time.如果已发生了依赖项更改，实例将立即调用时调用。If a dependency change has already occurred, the instance will be called immediately when is called.否则为实例将会调用一次。Otherwise, the instance will be called only one time.这一次调用将发生种情况时调用方法，因为实例检测到更改，或当方法调用，以先发生者为准。This one time call occurs either when the method is called because the instance detected a change, or when the method is called on the , whichever occurs first.
- 由提供的实例实现应删除此关联的缓存项，通过使用指定的原因枚举。The instance that is provided by an implementation should remove the associated cache entry and specify a reason by using the enumeration.
- A实例可以调用方法之前已调用的缓存实现方法还是之后。A instance can call the method either before a cache implementation has called method or after.如果方法之前调用名为 base实现将通知发生这种情况的缓存，将触发要传递给回调时立即调用。If the method is called before is called, the base implementation will notify the cache that this has occurred and will trigger the callback to be passed to immediately when is invoked.传递给任何状态数据方法保存的更改监视器并随后传递到方法时调用方法。Any state data that is passed to the method is saved by the change monitor and subsequently passed to the method when the method is invoked.
- 更改监视器必须实现方法。A change monitor must implement the method.有关更多信息，请参见 方法文档。For more information, see the method documentation.
- 必须调用方法重载，若要释放实例。The method overload must be called to dispose of the instance.调用 Dispose 的规则如下所示：The rules for calling Dispose are as follows:
- 某个项插入缓存之前，它是调用方，若要释放的责任实例。Before an item is inserted into the cache, it is the responsibility of caller to dispose of a instance.
- 一次缓存项和与其关联的实例传递到缓存中，缓存实施者必须确保，调用方法时，即使插入操作失败。Once cache item and the instances that are associated with it are passed to a cache, the cache implementer must make sure that that the method is called, even if the insert fails.
- 在将项及其关联实例传递到缓存中，调用方必须不会释放依赖项，因为当方法调用，因此调用将被视为依赖项已更改。After an item and its associated instances are passed to a cache, the caller must not dispose the dependency because when the method is called, the call is treated as if the dependency has changed.因此，自动调用方法。As a result, the method is automatically invoked.
- 考虑到，这些规则必须按以下方式之一调用方法：Taking these rules into consideration, the method must be called in one of the following ways:
- 用户必须调用方法重载，如果他们决定不向缓存中插入派生的更改监视器实例。Users must call the method overload if they decide not to insert the derived change-monitor instance into a cache.
- 如果实现尝试插入对象缓存的更改监视器实例，但插入失败，缓存实现负责调用重载。If the implementation tries to insert the change-monitor instance into an object cache but the insertion fails, the cache implementation is responsible for calling the overload.在插入尝试会导致异常，必须释放任何关联的依赖关系类型的缓存实现。When the insertion attempt causes an exception, the cache implementation must dispose of any associated dependencies.
- 如果删除缓存项，则缓存实现还必须释放依赖项的类型。If the cache entry is removed, the cache implementation must also dispose of the dependency.
- 内部实现方法将自动调用方法在调用回调，之后注册通过。The internal implementation of the method automatically calls the method after it calls a callback that is registered through .
自动对在事件激发期间的 dispose 方法调用时才会出现的初始化以前完成实例。This automatic call to the dispose method during the event firing only occurs if the initialization of the instance was previously completed.当派生的更改监视器的构造函数调用方法时，如果更改监视器的状态已更改 （构造函数时仍处于活动状态监视已更改状态） 则方法将自动释放此更改监视器的类型。When a derived change monitor's constructor calls the method, if the state of the change monitor has already changed (that is, the state that is monitored already changed when the constructor was still active) then the method will automatically dispose of the change monitor.
- 属性设置为后方法由派生的更改监视器实例，而不管是否调用已通过调用设置对象方法或不。The property is set to after the method is called by the derived change-monitor instance, regardless of whether a object has been set by a call to the method or not.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 从派生类中的构造函数调用此构造函数以初始化基类。

span.span: This constructor is called from constructors in derived classes to initialize the base class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类具有一个默认构造函数。The class has a default constructor. 但是，类继承自基类类并定义自定义的更改监视行为必须在构造函数中执行初始化。However, classes that inherit from the base class and define custom change-monitoring behavior must perform initialization in the constructor. 有关详细信息，请参阅继承者部分的说明。For more information, see the Notes for Inheritors section.

para.span: 派生类的构造函数必须设置属性，开始监视，并调用类之前它将返回。

span.span: The constructor of a derived class must set the property, begin monitoring, and call the class before it returns.

para.span: 如果在初始化之前的依赖项发生更改已完成 （例如，如果在缓存中找不到依赖的缓存密钥时），则构造函数必须调用方法之前调用方法。

span.span: If a dependency changes before initialization is complete (for example, if a dependent cache key is not found in the cache), the constructor must call the method before it calls the method.

para.span: 在这种情况下，构造函数可以调用方法之后才调用方法，因为方法引发异常，如果未完成初始化。

span.span: In this case, constructor can call the method only after the method is called, because the method throws an exception if initialization is not completed.

summary.span: 释放 类的当前实例所使用的所有资源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the current instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法用于释放实例和相关的资源。The method is used to release the instance and related resources. 公共，协调处置流程与密钥生命周期事件的派生的更改监视器类 （如初始化），并释放调用方法实例，使该实例可以作为垃圾回收。The public method is invoked to coordinate the disposal process with key life-cycle events of derived change-monitor classes (such as initialization), and to release the instance so that the instance can be garbage collected. 方法由实现派生的更改监视器类，若要释放其托管和非托管资源。The method is implemented by derived change-monitor classes to dispose of their managed and unmanaged resources.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed

summary.span: 释放由 类的当前实例占用的所有资源。

span.span: Releases all resources that are used by the current instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法调用派生的类仅一次，第一次调用时的方法。The method invokes the method of derived classes only one time, the first time it is called. 后续调用方法不起任何作用。Subsequent calls to the method have no effect. 调用该方法后，属性设置为`true`。After the method has been called, the property is set to `true`. 必须调用重载，若要释放实例。The overload must be called to dispose of a instance. 规则调用的 dispose 方法如下：The following are the rules for calling the dispose method: - 某个项插入缓存之前，它是调用方负责释放实例。Before an item is inserted into the cache, it is the caller's responsibility to dispose of a instance. - 一次缓存项和与其关联的实例传递到缓存中，必须确保缓存实施者调用，即使插入操作失败。Once cache item and the instances that are associated with it are passed to a cache, the cache implementer that must make sure that is called, even if the insert fails. - 在将项及其关联实例传递到缓存中，调用方必须不会释放依赖项，因为当方法调用，因此调用将被视为依赖项已更改。After an item and its associated instances are passed to a cache, the caller must not dispose the dependency because when the method is called, the call is treated as if the dependency has changed. 因此，自动调用方法。As a result, the method is automatically invoked. - 考虑到，这些规则必须按以下方式之一调用方法：Taking these rules into consideration, the method must be called in one of the following ways: - 用户必须调用方法重载，如果他们决定不向缓存中插入派生的更改监视器实例。Users must call the method overload if they decide not to insert the derived change-monitor instance into a cache. - 缓存实现负责调用重载如果实现尝试插入对象缓存的更改监视器实例，但插入操作将失败。The cache implementation is responsible for calling the overload if the implementation tries to insert the change-monitor instance into an object cache but the insertion fails. 当插入尝试导致异常时，则缓存实现必须释放任何关联的依赖关系。When the insertion attempt causes an exception, the cache implementation must dispose any associated dependencies. - 如果删除缓存项，则缓存实现还必须释放依赖项。If the cache entry is removed, the cache implementation must also dispose the dependency. 内部实现方法将自动调用方法在调用回调，之后注册通过方法。The internal implementation of the method automatically calls the method after it calls a callback that is registered through the method. > [!NOTE] > 在事件激发期间此自动释放时，才出现的初始化以前完成的实例。This automatic dispose during the event firing only occurs if the initialization of the instance previously completed. 当派生的更改监视器的构造函数调用方法时，如果更改监视器的状态已更改 （即，将监视的状态已更改构造函数时仍处于活动状态） 然后方法将自动释放更改监视器。When a derived change monitor's constructor calls the method, if the state of the change monitor has already changed (that is, the state that is monitored has already changed when the constructor was still active) then method will automatically dispose the change monitor. > [!NOTE] > 用户不应调用方法。Users should not call the method. 但是，不能防止用户调用方法。However, you cannot prevent users from calling the method. 因此，如果他们这样做，调用方法。Therefore, if they do, the method is invoked. 在这种情况下，就像依赖项已更改，都会收到通知的缓存项。In that case, the cache entry is notified as if the dependency has changed. 若要防止派生的类重写方法，该方法不是显式接口实现。To prevent derived classes from overriding method, the method is not an explicit interface implementation.

exception.span: 在调用 基方法的派生更改监视器类中，初始化未完成。

span.span: Initialization is not complete in the derived change-monitor class that called the base method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected MustOverride Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)

param.name: disposing
param.span: 若要释放托管资源和非托管资源，以及对 实例的任何引用，则为 ；若要仅释放非托管资源，则为 。

span.span: to release managed and unmanaged resources and any references to a instance; to release only unmanaged resources.

param.span: 传递 时， 方法由 线程调用，所有外部托管引用由于已经作为垃圾回收，因此可能不再有效。

span.span: When is passed, the method is called by a thread and any external managed references are likely no longer valid because they have already been garbage collected.

summary.span: 释放所有托管资源和非托管资源，以及对 实例的任何引用。

span.span: Releases all managed and unmanaged resources and any references to the instance.

summary.span: 此重载必须由派生的更改监视器类实现。

span.span: This overload must be implemented by derived change-monitor classes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 时的值`disposing`值是`true`，释放所有的托管和非托管资源，并且对此对象的任何引用都释放，以便派生的更改监视器实例可以被垃圾回收。When the value of `disposing` value is `true`, all managed and unmanaged resources are disposed and any references to this object are released so that the derived change-monitor instance can be garbage collected. 这样就保证基方法将调用实现方法仅一次。It is guaranteed that the base method will invoke the implemented method only one time.

para.span: 更改监视器必须实现重载以释放所有托管和非托管资源时的值是。

span.span: A change monitor must implement the overload to release all managed and unmanaged resources when the value of is .

para.span: 具有方法重载值只调用一次，即，当第一次释放实例时。

span.span: The method overload that has a value of is called only one time, namely, when the instance is disposed for the first time.

para.span: 更改监视器不能调用直接重载。

span.span: A change monitor must not call the overload directly.

para.span: 派生的更改监视器可以调用公共参数的方法对基础类。

span.span: A derived change monitor can call the public parameter-less method on the base class.

para.span: 或者，更改监视器可以实现终结器方法。

span.span: Alternatively, a change monitor can implement a finalizer method.

para.span: 在这种情况下，可以调用终结器方法并将其传递值。

span.span: In that case, the finalizer can invoke the method and pass it a value of .

para.span: 但是，这是通常不必要的。

span.span: However, this is usually unnecessary.

para.span: 通常，由保留的更改监视器实例的引用的服务执行对依赖项更改的监视。

span.span: Monitoring for dependency changes is typically performed by a service that maintains a reference to the change-monitor instance.

para.span: 引用避免被垃圾回收，该实例，因此不必要的终结器方法。

span.span: The reference prevents the instance from being garbage collected, and therefore makes a finalizer method unnecessary.

para.span: 若要在一个依赖项更改时, 避免内存泄露，方法释放更改监视器实例 （除非初始化尚未完成）。

span.span: To avoid memory leaks, when a dependency changes, the method disposes the change-monitor instance (unless initialization has not finished).

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property HasChanged As Boolean
public: property bool HasChanged { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示由 类监视的状态已发生更改。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates that the state that is monitored by the class has changed.

value.span: 如果由 实例监视的状态已发生更改，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the state that is monitored by the instance has changed; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以检查在派生的此属性的值类，以查看是否已更改依赖项。You can check the value of this property in a derived class to see whether a dependency has changed. 值设置为`true`依赖项更改发生时 (即，当调用方法)。The value is set to `true` when a dependency change occurs (that is, when the method is called). 后方法由派生类的值调用属性将为`true`，无论已通过调用通知实例方法。After the method is called by the derived class, the value of the property will be `true`, regardless of whether a instance has been notified by a call to the method. > [!NOTE] > 调用方可以检查属性以查看是否已更改依赖项。Callers can check the property to see whether a dependency has changed. 但是，在多线程环境中，更简单且更易于维护的方法是将数据插入的缓存实现，而不会检查属性。However, in a multi-threaded environment, a simpler and more maintainable approach is to insert data into a cache implementation without checking the property. 缓存实现必须检查为你的属性和必须不执行 insert 或设置操作，如果一个或多个关联的依赖关系已更改。Cache implementations must check the property for you and must not perform an insert or set operation if one or more associated dependencies have already changed.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig instance void InitializationComplete() cil managed

summary.span: 从派生类的构造函数进行调用以指示初始化已完成。

span.span: Called from the constructor of derived classes to indicate that initialization is finished.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果一个依赖项更改之前初始化已完成在派生类，派生类的构造函数必须调用方法。If a dependency changes before initialization is complete in a derived class, the constructor of the derived class must invoke the method. 当调用方法时，属性自动设置为`true`更改监视器。When the method is invoked, the property is automatically set to `true` by the change monitor. 因此，当更改监视器的构造函数调用方法时，将自动调用基类方法。As a result, when the change monitor's constructor calls the method, the base class will automatically call the method. 如果初始化已完成，方法自动释放派生的更改监视器实例。If initialization is complete, the method automatically disposes the derived change-monitor instance.

para.span: 派生类的构造函数必须调用基构造函数将返回之前的方法。

span.span: The constructor of a derived class must call the base method before the constructor returns.

para.span: 派生类的构造函数可以调用方法之后才调用，因为方法引发异常，如果未完成初始化。

span.span: The constructor of a derived class can call the method only after is called, because the method throws an exception if initialization is not completed.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsDisposed As Boolean
public: property bool IsDisposed { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示释放 类的派生实例。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates that the derived instance of a class is disposed.

value.span: 如果释放该实例，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the instance is disposed; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性设置为`true`后基方法调用派生的类，若要释放的实例中的方法。The property is set to `true` after the base method calls the method in a derived class to dispose of the instance.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void NotifyOnChanged(class System.Runtime.Caching.OnChangedCallback onChangedCallback) cil managed

param.name: onChangedCallback
param.span: 对在某个依赖项更改时要调用的方法的引用。

span.span: A reference to a method that is invoked when a dependency has changed.

summary.span: 由缓存实施者调用来注册回调，并在某个依赖项已更改时通过 委托通知 实例。

span.span: Called by Cache implementers to register a callback and notify an instance through the delegate when a dependency has changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 缓存实施者使用此方法连接到的更改监视器。Cache implementers use this method to wire themselves up to a change monitor. 如果你将一个或多个更改与缓存项的监视器，则传递具有的针对缓存项的填充的更改监视器属性实例。If you associate one or more change monitors with the cache item, you pass a instance with a populated change monitors property to the cache item. 支持更改监视器缓存实施者负责遍历属性和寄存器委托与每个更改它找到的监视器。A cache implementer that supports change monitors is responsible for iterating over the property and register the delegates with each change monitor that it finds. 因为委托包括可选状态参数，则具体更改监视器实现可以传递可选状态信息。Because the delegate includes an optional state parameter, a concrete change monitor implementation can pass optional state information. 缓存实施者确定是否可将显式依赖类型的回调的一部分传递的自定义更改监视器的状态。The cache implementer determines whether an explicit dependency on the type of state that a custom change monitor passes as part of the callback can be taken. > [!NOTE] > 基缓存可扩展性 API 将显式依赖项，不要求对类型的状态。The base cache extensibility API has no requirement for explicit dependency on the type of state. 实现方法自动确定监视器的状态是否已更改时调用方法。The implementation of the method automatically determines whether the state of the monitor has already changed at the time method is called. 如果属性是`true`，则该方法会自动调用事件处理程序中，已注册，通过方法。If the property is `true`, then the method automatically calls the event handler, that was registered, through the method. 发生这种情况是因为它是可能，从缓存实现创建的更改监视器，缓存实现获取监视器和最多，线本身的时间的时间的基础的监视的状态已更改。This occurs because it is possible that from the time a cache implementation creates a change monitor, to the time a cache implementation gets the monitor and wires itself up to it, the underlying monitored state has changed. 如果状态已更改的对象传递给方法是`null`。If the state has already changed then the object that is passed to the method is `null`. 方法可以调用仅一次，并将在后续调用中引发异常。The method can be invoked only one time, and will throw an exception on subsequent calls.

span.span: The callback method has already been invoked.
is .

block.para:
1. 必须调用方法的任何依赖项更改的通知。You must call the method to be notified of any dependency changes.如果已发生了依赖项更改，实例时将会调用调用。If a dependency change has already occurred, the instance will be called when is called.否则为实例将会调用一次时调用方法时，或者当调用方法，以先发生者为准。Otherwise, the instance will be called one time, either when the method is called or when the method is called, whichever occurs first.提供缓存实现实例应删除缓存项，如果请求的缓存调用方，则引发必要的更改或更新事件，回退到原始缓存调用方。The instance provided by the cache implementation should remove the cache entry and if it is requested by the cache caller, raise the necessary change or update event back to the original cache caller.
2. 对象缓存实现必须删除与依赖关系更改相关联的缓存项。The object cache implementation must remove the cache entry that is associated with a dependency change.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig instance void OnChanged(object state) cil managed

span.span: The data for the change event.
This value can be .

summary.span: 由派生类调用以在某个依赖项发生更改时引发事件。

span.span: Called by derived classes to raise the event when a dependency changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常情况下，发生依赖项更改时调用方法。Typically, the method is called when dependency changes occur. 释放更改监视器实例，但仅当尚未调用回调时，才会发生释放时也会调用方法。The method is also invoked when a change-monitor instance is disposed but the disposal occurs only if the callback has not already been invoked. 如果方法之前调用调用方法时，调用的状态数据方法保存的缓存实现。If the method is called before the method is called, the state data from the call to the method is saved by the cache implementation. 此外，到回调立即调用方法时调用方法。Also, the callback to the method is invoked immediately when the method is invoked.

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property UniqueId As String
public: abstract property System::String ^ UniqueId { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个表示 类实例的值。

span.span: Gets a value that represents the class instance.

value.span: 某个更改监视器实例的标识符。

span.span: The identifier for a change-monitor instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性值通常包括依赖关系名称组合字符串数据的唯一标识符的数据的所监视的实例。The property value typically consists of dependency names combined string data that uniquely identifiers the data that is being monitored by a instance. 值属性是一个字符串。The value of the property is a string. 字符串的值用于分配的唯一 ID实例。The value of the string is used to assign the unique ID of the instance.

para.span: 通过重写属性，可以定义的属性的字符串值的自定义实现，以便将其分配唯一 id。

span.span: By overriding the property, you can define a custom implementation for the string value of the property in order to assign it a unique ID.

para.span: 在派生类中，必须在构造函数中设置属性的值。

span.span: In derived classes, you must set the value of the property in the constructor.
